results.content: This is the best I ever took in Udemy. If you have a litle experience in HTML and JS you can accomplish a lot with this course. Also I been receiving great response by the lecturer when I have some doubts.

results.content: I took it looking for a way to make a frontend with vanilla JS. I havent been able to find a concise example of projects done in vanilla JS. some parts of the course was a learning curve for me but I really enjoyed the course and love Basir's presentation of the code in the video. I hope to use this course as a template to help me create other web apps and explore. I definitely want to see more videos on the fundamentals of JS. Basir is a good teacher and I am glad I stumbled upon him.

I hope to use this course as a template to help me create other web apps and explore. I definitely want to see more videos on the fundamentals of JS. Basir is a good teacher and I am glad I stumbled upon him.

results.content: Highly Recommended. One of THE BEST course/project in JavaScript. Got to LEARN & APPLY modern JavaScript, MongoDB and Heroku. It's amazing how we can mimic React like single-page app and components using vanilla JS. Thank you Basir!

results.content:
This course focuses on DOM manipulation, handling arrays and working with async functions. I am a new javascript developer and have no ES6 coding experience. 
If you want to take this lesson you need to know ES6 syntax especially arrow functions, spread operators and asynchronous programming.

btw thanks Basir for having intro and summary at the beginning and end of each lesson.
results.content_html:
This course focuses on DOM manipulation, handling arrays and working with async functions. I am a new javascript developer and have no ES6 coding experience.
If you want to take this lesson you need to know ES6 syntax especially arrow functions, spread operators and asynchronous programming.

btw thanks Basir for having intro and summary at the beginning and end of each lesson.
